Articles.Content:
Hello i have problem with my custom ion engine. Engine cant found electric charge in vessel. 

PART {

name = radialengine
module = Part
author = adip

mesh = model.mu
rescaleFactor = 1.0

node_attach = 0.0, 0.0, 0.00, 0.0, 0.0, -1.0, 0

fx_exhaustFlame_white_tiny = 0.0, -0.075, -0.3, 0.0, 1.0, 0.0, running

sound_vent_medium = engage
sound_rocket_mini = running
sound_vent_soft = disengage
sound_explosion_low = flameout

cost = 150
category = Propulsion
subcategory = 0
title = Liquid Fart Engine
manufacturer = electric engine
description = electric engine
attachRules = 0,1,0,1,0

mass = 0.03
dragModelType = default
maximum_drag = 0.2
minimum_drag = 0.2
angularDrag = 2
crashTolerance = 7
maxTemp = 3600


MODULE
{
	name = ModuleEngines
	thrustVectorTransformName = thrustTransform
	exhaustDamage = False
	ignitionThreshold = 0.1
	minThrust = 0
	maxThrust = 10
	heatProduction = 0
	fxOffset = 0, 0, 0.05
	PROPELLANT
	{
		name = ElectricCharge
        	ratio = 12
	}
	PROPELLANT
	{
		name = Farts
		ratio = 0.1
	}
}

}

Can someone help me with this?

Edited August 7, 2013 by adip
